title: Norton backup sets
content: I can no longer access my Norton Backup sets/files. I need to switch to Chrome or Edge to see them. Why?
creator: baf739

title: How do I remove "Other Bookmarks" folder in Bookmarks Sidebar
content: How do I remove "Other Bookmarks" folder in Bookmarks Sidebar? It is a very annoying folder that I don't need or want.
creator: SimonHarrison

title: Cannot delete Firefox account, says wrong password
content:
I have many Multi account containers on my firefox account, they are no longer syncing across devices, even when a build a brand new profile.

I need this fixed, so in despiration, I am going to delete my firefox account. When I attempted to it states that I have the incorrect password, but, I don't as it's the same PW I'm entering when logging in.

How can I fix this?
creator: jrofx

title: Firefox 104.0.1 64bit Tab Wheel Scroll Alternate add-on
content: looking for. Windows 11 64bit Is there any alternative add-on for "Tab Wheel Scroll" for firefox 104.0.1? The current tab is a vertical display tab.
creator: wakuwaku0016

title: Firefox PDF viewer shipping label barcodes are bad
content: When I use the firefox 104.0.1 pdf viewer to print shipping labels they look fine in the preview but when I print them the barcodes are missing all the small lines and where it says P or F up in the top left box it just prints some block looking thing. Prints fine from Adobe or Preview. Mac Big Sur .
creator: jcos1966

title: Account login stopped working for Bell.ca
content: About 2 updates ago I starting having issues logging into my Bell.ca account to retrieve my monthly bill. After many conversations will Bell they say that they aren't the problem. I have had to use either Chrome or Edge to get my bill and I don't like either one of those browsers. Can you suggest what might be going on?
creator: jdp0806

title: After proper pc restart, all of my tabs/pages are Gone. Firefox failed to restore pages, session, everything. Help!
content: I restarted my pc, properly. Everything is setup on Firefox to restore sessions/pages. It has always worked properly, until now. Nothing was restored. Im livid. Ive checked everything I know to check. If this is the new Firefox, Im gone. I keep tabs open for work, etc. Any suggestions are greatly appreciated.
creator: muzik7

title: Other Bookmarks in the Firefox Toolbar is missing
content: I had an arrow on the right side of my FF Toolbar for "Other Bookmarks". Recently it went missing. I have many bookmarks under that heading, and can get to them through the Bookmarks Manager, but no arrow on the Toolbar. How can I get it back?
creator: Barry_Merchant
